description: Use csm-data to send runner data to Azure Data Explorer. Requires a valid Azure Data Explorer configuration, here using environment variables.

CSM_DATASET_ABSOLUTE_PATH.description: Target folder containing dataset files to send to ADX

CSM_PARAMETERS_ABSOLUTE_PATH.description: Folder containing parameter files to send to ADX

AZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_RESOURCE_URI.description: URI required to connect to Azure Data Explorer

AZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_RESOURCE_INGEST_URI.description: Ingestion URI for Azure Data Explorer

AZURE_DATA_EXPLORER_DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in Azure Data Explorer
